name: The Sole Survivor
description:
Remember: You Can Control Ui Only With Mouse

sole Survivor.

it's A Maze,

A Man Goes to His Destination and then Helicopter


Crash In Mystery Jungle, The Man Survive in Helicopter Crash And He Wake Up For Surviving,

Little Walk And You Can Find So Many Creatures: Golems, Skeletons, Giant Mantis, Etc.

You Can Use Fighting Combo Skill And If You find Axe then You Have Weapon Combo Skill For Surviving, You Can Carry Axe On Your Back,

When You Get Damaged So You Can Find First Aid For Healing, In The Water You Can Swim But In Water A Oxygen System If You Stay In For A while You Gonna Be Die, ETC,

if You Survive So Your A Sole Survivor,

let the Challenge Begin.
